subject: RE: [junit] regarding junit perf - Solve this problem
msgSnippet: ... You don t try to predict maxElapsedTime. It s a constraint that you impose. Presumably, you have a requirement that the task not take longer than N
messageBody:
RE: [junit] regarding junit perf - Solve this problem

Bala Subramanian wrote:
>     glad to receive a mail from u .U didn't answer to one of
> my question
> I asked u "How can i give maxElapsedTime for a function " .As U have
> given approximately 12 seconds for your example (function
> testHttpResponse)
> .How can u predict the maxElapsedTime to 12 sec for
> that .Is there any formula or documents saying "How to calculate
> maxElapsedTime for a particular time ".I need your help
> very urgently .Or is there any person who can solve this problem ,

You don't try to predict maxElapsedTime. It's a constraint that you impose.

Presumably, you have a requirement that the task not take longer than N milliseconds. Simply set maxElapsedTime to N. If it takes longer than N milliseconds to do the test, the test fails.

Robert.
